original: Carlbom, Gunnar August Cappelen, rådman, Alingsås, f. 4/7/05 i Viksjö, Västernorrl. 1., av kyrkoh. August Edvard C. o. Agne’S Bergliot Smith. G. 36 m. Viola Stenklyft. Barn: Solveig f. 38, Gunnar 41, Agneta 42. — Stud:-ex. v. Palmgr. samsk. i Sthlm 24, jur. kand. i Sthlm 32. Tingstjg. i Umeå doms. samt i Västerb. s. doms. 32-35, tjg. i Göta hovr. 35-39, e. fiskal där 36, förste rådm. i Alingsås sed. 39. Ordf. i byggnmd, hyres:nd o. rusthålil, ’sekr. h. .stad&fullm. o. dess beredniutsk. samt h. drätselkamm., hemv :omr :be-fälh. Hobbies: sky t te o, fiske.
translated: Carlbom, Gunnar August Cappelen, magistrate, Alingsås, born on July 4, 1905 in Viksjö, Västernorrland, firstborn of the Reverend August Edvard C. and Agne's Bergliot Smith. Married to Viola Stenklyft in 1936. Children: Solveig born in 1938, Gunnar in 1941, and Agneta in 1942. He passed his high school exam at Palmgrenska samskolan in Stockholm in 1924 and graduated with a law degree from Stockholm University in 1932. He served as a court clerk in Umeå District Court and the Västerbotten Southern District Court from 1932-1935 and as an assessor in the Court of Appeal in Gothenburg from 1935-1939, becoming a magistrate in Alingsås in 1939. He was the chairman of the building committee, rental committee and armory committee, secretary of the city council and its preparation committee and city treasurer as well as the commander of the home guard. His hobbies included shooting and fishing.
